column4: Installing Ubuntu on a second PC -- how can I copy all the setup stuff I've done on the first?  What files should I copy over other than sources.list

only learn more, by re-doing all the setup stuff you did on the first one, by doing it on the second one.. learning experince.. first hand, and second hand.. you might find more options on the second time around.. ;)
I'm trying to make this simple and painless for my wife...
how nice of you, ignore my comments, I' truely should re-name myself, SarcasmBot.. :)
